016package com.nickbenn.adventofcode.day12;
017
018import com.nickbenn.adventofcode.view.DataSource;
019import java.io.IOException;
020import java.util.HashMap;
021import java.util.Iterator;
022import java.util.LinkedList;
023import java.util.List;
024import java.util.Map;
025import java.util.regex.Pattern;
026import java.util.stream.Collectors;
027import java.util.stream.Stream;
028
029public class HotSprings {
030
031  private static final Pattern LINE_SPLITTER = Pattern.compile("\\s+");
032  private static final Pattern GROUP_SPLITTER = Pattern.compile("\\s*,\\s*");
033  private static final char OPERATIONAL = '.';
034  private static final char DAMAGED = '#';
035  private static final char UNKNOWN = '?';
036  private static final String UNFOLDED_CONDITIONS_DELIMITER = "?";
037  private static final String UNFOLDED_GROUPS_DELIMITER = ",";
038
039  private final Map<MemoKey, Long> memo;
040  private final List<String> conditionRecords;
041  private final List<List<Integer>> damageGroupRecords;
042
043  public HotSprings(int repetitions) throws IOException {
044    this(DataSource.DEFAULT_INPUT_FILE, repetitions);
045  }
046
047  public HotSprings(String inputFile, int repetitions) throws IOException {
048    try (Stream<String> lines = DataSource.simpleLines(inputFile, this)) {
049      memo = new HashMap<>();
050      conditionRecords = new LinkedList<>();
051      damageGroupRecords = new LinkedList<>();
052      lines.forEach((line) -> parse(line, conditionRecords, damageGroupRecords, repetitions));
053    }
054  }
055
056  public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
057    System.out.println(new HotSprings(1).sumArrangements());
058    System.out.println(new HotSprings(5).sumArrangements());
059  }
060
061  public long sumArrangements() {
062    long sum = 0;
063    Iterator<String> conditionRecordIterator = conditionRecords.iterator();
064    Iterator<List<Integer>> damageGroupRecordIterator = damageGroupRecords.iterator();
065    while (conditionRecordIterator.hasNext()) {
066      String conditions = conditionRecordIterator.next();
067      List<Integer> groups = damageGroupRecordIterator.next();
068      long count = getCount(conditions, groups, 0, OPERATIONAL);
069      sum += count;
070    }
071    return sum;
072  }
073
074  private void parse(String line, List<String> conditionRecords,
075      List<List<Integer>> damageGroupRecords, int repetitions) {
076    String[] splitRecord = LINE_SPLITTER.split(line);
077    String unfoldedConditions = Stream.generate(() -> splitRecord[0])
078        .limit(repetitions)
079        .collect(Collectors.joining(UNFOLDED_CONDITIONS_DELIMITER));
080    conditionRecords.add(unfoldedConditions);
081    List<Integer> unfoldedGroupSizes = GROUP_SPLITTER
082        .splitAsStream(
083            Stream.generate(() -> splitRecord[1])
084                .limit(repetitions)
085                .collect(Collectors.joining(UNFOLDED_GROUPS_DELIMITER))
086        )
087        .map(Integer::valueOf)
088        .toList();
089    damageGroupRecords.add(unfoldedGroupSizes);
090  }
091
092  private long getCount(
093      String conditions, List<Integer> groups, int currentGroupSize, char previous) {
094    long count;
095    MemoKey key = new MemoKey(conditions, groups, currentGroupSize);
096    count = memo.getOrDefault(key, Long.MIN_VALUE);
097    if (count < 0) {
098      count = count(conditions, groups, currentGroupSize, previous);
099      memo.put(key, count);
100    }
101    return count;
102  }
103
104  private long count(String conditions, List<Integer> groups, int currentGroupSize, char previous) {
105    long count;
106    if (conditions.isEmpty()) {
107      count = (groups.isEmpty() || groups.size() == 1 && currentGroupSize == groups.get(0)) ? 1 : 0;
108    } else {
109      char current = conditions.charAt(0);
110      conditions = conditions.substring(1);
111      count = switch (current) {
112        case OPERATIONAL -> countForOperational(conditions, groups, currentGroupSize, previous);
113        case DAMAGED -> countForDamaged(conditions, groups, currentGroupSize);
114        case UNKNOWN -> countForOperational(conditions, groups, currentGroupSize, previous)
115            + countForDamaged(conditions, groups, currentGroupSize);
116        default -> throw new IllegalArgumentException();
117      };
118    }
119    return count;
120  }
121
122  private long countForOperational(
123      String conditions, List<Integer> groups, int currentGroupSize, char previous) {
124    return (previous != DAMAGED)
125        ? getCount(conditions, groups, 0, OPERATIONAL)
126        : (currentGroupSize != groups.get(0))
127            ? 0
128            : getCount(conditions, groups.subList(1, groups.size()), 0, OPERATIONAL);
129  }
130
131  private long countForDamaged(String conditions, List<Integer> groups, int currentGroupSize) {
132    return (groups.isEmpty() || currentGroupSize >= groups.get(0))
133        ? 0
134        : getCount(conditions, groups, currentGroupSize + 1, DAMAGED);
135  }
136
137  private record MemoKey(String conditions, List<Integer> groups, int currentGroupSize) {
138  }
139
140}
